definitions.definition: A non- autonomous entity that claims to be a sovereign state and mimics the actions of a state (with varying degrees of seriousness ), but lacks any legal recognition and exists only on paper or in the mind of its creator ; a micronational entity .
Synonym of microstate ( “ a country that has a very small population and land area ” ) .

main_definition: A non- autonomous entity that claims to be a sovereign state and mimics the actions of a state (with varying degrees of seriousness ), but lacks any legal recognition and exists only on paper or in the mind of its creator ; a micronational entity .
secondary_definitions: Synonym of microstate ( “ a country that has a very small population and land area ” ) .

definitions.definition: A small nation ( “ historically constituted, stable community of people , formed based on a common language , territory , economic life, ethnicity and manifested in a common culture ” ) .

main_definition: ( uncommon ) A small nation ( “ historically constituted, stable community of people , formed based on a common language , territory , economic life, ethnicity and manifested in a common culture ” ) .
